title: Facing Massive Debt, Puerto Ricans Warned Belt Tightening Will Be Needed
teaser: Puerto Rico's governor says the U.S. territory will be unable to pay off some of its more than $72 billion debt, and that terms will have to be renegotiated. He's also calling for big budget cuts.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
